fields.name: AllowedValues
fields.description: Specifies the valid streaming units a streaming job can scale to.

fields.name: Default
fields.description: Specifies the default streaming units that the streaming job can use.

fields.name: Maximum
fields.description: Specifies the maximum streaming units that the streaming job can use.

fields.name: Minimum
fields.description: Specifies the minimum streaming units that the streaming job can use.

fields.name: ScaleType
fields.description: The scale type applicable to the SKU.
